pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conventional and Fuzzy Data Envelopment Analysis // Set of functions for Data Envelopment Analysis, including classical, fuzzy, cross-efficiency, bootstrapping, and Malmquist models. See: Banker, R.; Charnes, A.; Cooper, W.W. (1984). doi:10.1287/mnsc.30.9.1078, Charnes, A.; Cooper, W.W.; Rhodes, E. (1978). doi:10.1016/0377-2217(78)90138-8 and Charnes, A.; Cooper, W.W.; Rhodes, E. (1981). doi:10.1287/mnsc.27.6.668.
